name: Crossroads (COMPUTE! Plublications, Inc.)
overview: Published in COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1987/12 (Issue #54). You battle a host of hostile, militant creatures. The fight takes place in a maze, which is different at teach level. You progress by capturing "Spars" - Whirling fans with magical and game changing properties. ON each level you'll encounter new hordes of monsters. This game was followed up exactly one year later in the December 1988 issue by a sequel called Crossroads II: Pandemonium.
